inclusion.criterion: with total or partial penile loss as a complication from ritual circumcision
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: who are willing and able to provide written, informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppression (HIV positive, diabetes mellitus or drugs affecting immune response)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active tuberculosis (TB) or a history of TB
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Disorders of circulation (e.g. peripheral vascular disease, vasculitis)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Renal failure and not on a renal replacement programme
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Systemic disease deemed by the investigator serious enough to preclude the use of immunosuppression agents
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are unwilling, unable or unlikely to comply with immunosuppressive treatment and regular follow-up
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of acromegaly due to pituitary adenoma and recent surgery. He takes only vitamin D and multivitamins after his surgery.
